mapper.sql:
WHERE
TITLE
CONTENT
USER_ID
LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search} , '%')

D.*, -- 문서 전체 컬럼 U.NAME AS USER_NAME, -- 작성자 이름 U.POSITION AS USER_POSITION, -- 작성자 직급 F.NAME AS FORM_NAME, -- 양식 이름 ( IF(F.GRADE1 IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) + IF(F.GRADE2 IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) + IF(F.GRADE3 IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) + IF(F.GRADE4 IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) ) AS STEP_COUNT -- 결재 단계 수
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM DOCUMENTS D
JOIN USERS U ON D.USER_ID = U.USER_ID JOIN FORMS F ON D.FORM_ID = F.FORM_ID
WHERE D.STATUS != '임시' AND D.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT
FROM DOCUMENTS D
JOIN APPROVAL_LINES A ON D.DOCUMENT_ID = A.DOCUMENT_ID JOIN USERS U ON D.USER_ID = U.USER_ID JOIN FORMS F ON D.FORM_ID = F.FORM_ID
WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.STEP_ORDER = D.CURRENT_STEP AND D.STATUS ='진행중'

SELECT
FROM DOCUMENTS D
JOIN REFERENCE_LINES R ON D.DOCUMENT_ID = R.DOCUMENT_ID JOIN USERS U ON D.USER_ID = U.USER_ID JOIN FORMS F ON D.FORM_ID = F.FORM_ID
WHERE R.USER_ID = #{userId} AND D.STATUS != '임시'

SELECT
FROM DOCUMENTS D
JOIN USERS U ON D.USER_ID = U.USER_ID JOIN FORMS F ON D.FORM_ID = F.FORM_ID
WHERE D.STATUS = '임시' AND D.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT
FROM DOCUMENTS D
JOIN USERS U ON D.USER_ID = U.USER_ID JOIN FORMS F ON D.FORM_ID = F.FORM_ID
WHERE D.DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENTS (FORM_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID, TIME, CURRENT_STEP, STATUS) VALUES (#{formId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{time}, #{currentStep}, #{status})

INSERT INTO APPROVAL_LINES (DOCUMENT_ID, USER_ID, STEP_ORDER, STATUS, HANDLING_TIME, SIGN_ID, REJECT_REASON) VALUES (#{documentId}, #{userId}, #{stepOrder}, #{status}, #{handlingTime}, #{signId}, #{rejectReason})
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENTS (DOCUMENT_ID, ORIGIN_NAME, SAVE_NAME) VALUES (#{documentId}, #{originName}, #{saveName})
